chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type

Goal:
discrete X -> discrete (option X)

Premises:
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
discrete = fun X : Type => decidable (fun '(x, y) => x = y) : Type -> Prop Arguments discrete _%type_scope
discrete_prod : forall X Y : Type, discrete X -> discrete Y -> discrete (X * Y)
discrete_sum : forall X Y : Type, discrete X -> discrete Y -> discrete (X + Y)
discrete_bool = let H : forall X : Type, inhabited (eq_dec X) -> discrete X := fun X : Type => match discrete_iff X with | conj _ x0 => x0 end in H bool (inhabits bool_eq_dec) : discrete bool
discrete_nat = let H : forall X : Type, inhabited (eq_dec X) -> discrete X := fun X : Type => match discrete_iff X with | conj _ x0 => x0 end in H nat (inhabits nat_eq_dec) : discrete nat
discrete_nat_nat = let H : forall X : Type, inhabited (eq_dec X) -> discrete X := fun X : Type => match discrete_iff X with | conj _ x0 => x0 end in H (nat * nat)%type (inhabits (prod_eq_dec nat_eq_dec nat_eq_dec)) : discrete (nat * nat)
discrete_iff : forall X : Type, discrete X < -> inhabited (eq_dec X)
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
sum_eq_dec : forall X Y : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec Y -> eq_dec X + Y
prod_eq_dec : forall X Y : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec Y -> eq_dec X * Y
option_eq_dec : forall X : Type, eq_dec X -> eq_dec option X
decidable = fun (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) => exists f : X -> bool, decider f P : forall X : Type, (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments decidable {X}%type_scope _%function_scope
Tauto.TFormula = fun Term Annot TX AF : Type => Tauto.GFormula : Type -> Type -> Type -> Type -> Type Arguments Tauto.TFormula (_ _ _ _)%type_scope
enumerable = fun (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) => exists f : nat -> option X, enumerator f P : forall X : Type, (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments enumerable {X}%type_scope _%function_scope
Tauto.cnf = fun Term' Annot : Type => list (Tauto.clause Term' Annot) : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments Tauto.cnf (_ _)%type_scope
Tauto.clause = fun Term' Annot : Type => list (Term' * Annot) : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments Tauto.clause (_ _)%type_scope
enumerator = fun (X : Type) (f : nat -> option X) (P : X -> Prop) => forall x : X, P x < -> (exists n : nat, f n = Some x) : forall X : Type, (nat -> option X) -> (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments enumerator {X}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Tauto.foldA : forall ACC : Type, (ACC -> ?AA -> ACC) -> Tauto.GFormula -> ACC -> ACC where ?TA : [X : Type |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type |- Type] ?AA : [X : Type |- Type] ?AF : [X : Type |- Type]
Exc = fun A : Type => option A : Type -> Type Arguments Exc _%type_scope
decidable_iff : forall (X : Type) (p : X -> Prop), decidable p < -> inhabited (forall x : X, dec (p x))
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
Tauto.GFormula_rect : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Type, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [X : Type |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type |- Type] ?AA : [X : Type |- Type] ?AF : [X : Type |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_rec : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Set, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [X : Type |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type |- Type] ?AA : [X : Type |- Type] ?AF : [X : Type |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_sind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> SProp, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [X : Type |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type |- Type] ?AA : [X : Type |- Type] ?AF : [X : Type |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [X : Type |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type |- Type] ?AA : [X : Type |- Type] ?AF : [X : Type |- Type]
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
Inductive Pol (C : Type) : Type := Pc : C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C | Pinj : BinNums.positive -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C | PX : Ring_polynom.Pol C -> BinNums.positive -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C Arguments Ring_polynom.Pol _%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.Pc [C]%type_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.Pinj [C]%type_scope _%positive_scope Arguments Ring_polynom.PX [C]%type_scope _ _%positive_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record to_constrT (Term Annot TX : Type) : Type := Build_to_constrT { mkTT : TX; mkFF : TX; mkA : Term -> Annot -> TX; mkCj : TX -> TX -> TX; mkD : TX -> TX -> TX; mkI : TX -> TX -> TX; mkN : TX -> TX } Arguments Tauto.to_constrT (_ _ _)%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Build_to_constrT [Term Annot TX]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
